 SyncPaintDc (Control *control)

Detailed Description

Allows a comfortable usage for working on a Device-Context when doing a synchronous drawing. In opposite to the class PaintDc the class SyncPaintDc is used outside the context of Control::OnPaint.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SyncPaintDc::SyncPaintDc (  Control *  control  ) 
 

Parameters:
control Control where the drawing should be done. It is recommended that the auto clearing of the control is disabled by invoking Control::SetAutoClearEnabled(FALSE) on the initialization of the control. This is because usually auto-clearing leads to a flickering in combination with a synchronous drawing.
